name: Speed Sweeper
description:
Speed Sweeper

A competitive minesweeper speed-runner!
With multiple game modes, daily challenges, and online leader boards.
Focused on enabling speed running, the game is tailored towards players of all skill sets.
Take full control over the size of the game board, and amount of bombs.


Customize the board

Set custom board sizes, bomb amount, themes and backgrounds.

Game modes include:
  • Classic - Clear the board as fast as you can
  • Speed - Make each move before the timer runs out
  • Daily Challenge - Compete on the same board as everyone else
  • 3 Lives - Mines don't instantly end the game.
  • Tower - Complete 5 levels in a row
